name: DAP to Autoresponders Email Syncing
author: HardCoreITSolution

sections.description:
This plugin is used to sync the email address of Digital Access Pass (DAP) orders to Autoresponders.
Whenever the plugin’s cron hit, it fetches all the complete DAP orders email ids and sync them to the connected Autoresponders account.

Free Version
Sync DAP Orders Email of Customers to connected account of Mailchimp, Imnicamail and Infusionsoft.

Premium Plugin Version
Sync DAP Orders Email of Customers to connected account of Mailchimp, GetResponse and Infusionsoft, Aweber, Klick-Tipp, Sendreach, iContact and Imnicamail.

APIs of separate Autoresponders are used to sync emails.

Support: This is my second plugin after the success of WOAR (WooCommerce to Autoresponder Plugin). I am available 24-7 for support and lucky to have your feedback.

Get Pro License on www.spideb.in/daar/
sections.installation:
For a manual installation via FTP:

  1. Extract the downloaded plugin and upload to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in your WordPress admin area
  3. You will see a menu at the left hand side named with “DAAR”
  4. Enter Email id and License Key in License Tab (skip this if using Free version)
  5. Enter Corresponding Autoresponder’s detail to connect in Autoresponders Tab
  6. Either Check WP cron to use WordPress cron or you can set cpanel cron also.

To upload the plugin through WordPress, instead of FTP:

  1. Upload the downloaded zip file on the ‘Add New’ plugins screen (see the ‘Upload’ tab) in your WordPress admin area and activate.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in your WordPress admin area
  3. You will see a menu at the left hand side named with “DAAR”
  4. Enter Email id and License Key in License Tab (skip this if using Free version)
  5. Enter Corresponding Autoresponder’s detail to connect in Autoresponders Tab
  6. Either Check WP cron to use WordPress cron or you can set cpanel cron also.
sections.faq:
Where do i get a License Key for pro version?
Need to generate from DAAR sales page: https://www.spideb.in/daar/

What I do after getting License Key
When you get License Key you will also get Pro Version Plugin.You need to Remove your existing Free Version Plugin and need too upload the new one and then enter Your E-mail id and license key to get all the autoresponders.

Installation Instructions

For a manual installation via FTP:

  1. Extract the downloaded plugin and upload to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in your WordPress admin area
  3. You will see a menu at the left hand side named with “DAAR”
  4. Enter Email id and License Key in License Tab (skip this if using Free version)
  5. Enter Corresponding Autoresponder’s detail to connect in Autoresponders Tab
  6. Either Check WP cron to use WordPress cron or you can set cpanel cron also.

To upload the plugin through WordPress, instead of FTP:

  1. Upload the downloaded zip file on the ‘Add New’ plugins screen (see the ‘Upload’ tab) in your WordPress admin area and activate.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in your WordPress admin area
  3. You will see a menu at the left hand side named with “DAAR”
  4. Enter Email id and License Key in License Tab (skip this if using Free version)
  5. Enter Corresponding Autoresponder’s detail to connect in Autoresponders Tab
  6. Either Check WP cron to use WordPress cron or you can set cpanel cron also.
